Name: What can be done during Heat (general)
Description: All moves will deal chip damage on block
Comment: Cannot K.O. with chip damage, chip damage turns into recoverable health gauge

Name: What can be done during Heat (general)
Description: A Heat Dash can be used when a Heat Engager hits or is blocked (after activation, Heat will end)
Comment: Until Heat Engager reaches the opponent {f-hold} (or {HBHS}), additional chip damage on block

Name: What can be done during Heat (general)
Description: Heat Smash, a move that causes critical damage, can be activated (after activation, Heat will end)
Comment: During Heat {HBHS} (or {2+3})

Name: What can be done during Heat (unique)
Description: Powered up versions of sword moves that can only be performed during Mutou no Kiwami can be used from the normal stance

Name: What can be done during Heat (unique)
Description: Some sword moves during Manji Dragonfly are powered up
Comment: During Manji Dragonfly {1}, during Manji Dragonfly {f,1+2}

Name: Heat Burst
Comment: Partially uses remaining Heat time, 2+3,b,b to cancel attack

Name: Enma's Flame
Comment: Chip damage on block, shift to Manji Dragonfly (does not shift when using Heat Dash), power up during Mutou no Kiwami or during Heat (recovers health on hit, partially uses remaining Heat time)

Name: Kuzuryu
Comment: Power up during Mutou no Kiwami or Heat (recovers health on hit, partially uses remaining Heat time)

Name: Oma Kugiuchi
Comment: {b,2,n,1+2} to shift to Kincho

Name: Divine Sword Kagekiyo
Comment: Heat Smash, throw on hit, recover health on hit, on block {2+3,u-hold} to shift to Manji Dragonfly

Name: Trailokya Pilgrimage
Comment: Rage Art, erases opponent's recoverable health on hit

Name: Naguri Kabuto Wari
Comment: Chip damage on block, power up during Mutou no Kiwami or during Heat (recovers health on hit, partially uses remaining Heat time)

Name: Seiken Douharai
Comment: Becomes Karakuri Uzumaki during Mutou no Kiwami, {2,1,b-hold} to cancel

Name: Mushibami
Comment: Shift to Mutou no Kiwami on hit or block, {2,2,1+2} to shift to Kincho

Name: Enma's Flame
Comment: Chip damage on block, shift to Manji Dragonfly (does not shift when using Heat Dash), power up during Mutou no Kiwami or during Heat (recovers health on hit, partially uses remaining Heat time)

Comment: Chip damage on block, power up during Mutou no Kiwami or during Heat (recovers health on hit, partially uses remaining Heat time)

Name: Tobi Ushiwaka
Comment: {LB,3,4,RB,u-hold} to shift to Manji Dragonfly (cannot shift during Mutou no Kiwami)

Name: Wheel of Arrows > Sword Stab
Comment: {4,4,2,2,LB,1,1,RB} to shift to Sword Poke Windmill

Name: Kincho
Comment: Or while crouching {1+2}, to shift to Kincho, {1+2,f-hold} to move forward, {1+2,d-hold} to shift to crouching state, has strong attack reversal effect

Name: Meditation
Comment: Or {b,3+4} or back facing opponent {3+4}, shift to Meditation, regain recoverable health, {1+3} or {2+4} to shift to back throw, {3+4} to face backward

Name: Soul Stealer
Comment: Or while crouching {1+4}, power up during Mutou no Kiwami or during Heat (increased chip damage on block, recovers health on hit, partially uses remaining Heat time)

Name: Spirit Shield
Comment: Power up during Mutou no Kiwami

Name: Manji Backfist Shredder
Comment: Or back facing opponent {2,1}

Name: Toita Daoshi
Comment: Absorb an attack to power up and deal more chip damage on block

Name: Kuzuryu
Comment: Power up during Mutou no Kiwami or Heat (recovers health on hit, partially uses remaining Heat time)

Name: Kamikaze
Comment: {f,3+4,b-hold} to cancel and face backward, to shift to Running Flea on hit (cannot shift during Mutou no Kiwami)

Name: Wood Cutter
Comment: Chip damage, hold at last step to Death Slash, power up during Mutou no Kiwami or during Heat (recovers health on hit, partially uses remaining Heat time)

Comment: {df,1+4,1+2} to shift to Kincho, {f,d,df,1} to power up
